name: §aExperience Transporter Orb
tooltip: §ePut this at the middle column of the crafting table,
§eThe tool that receives EXP on its left, the tool that gives EXP on its right,
§eThen it will transport levels from the tool on the right to the tool on the left.
§6Both tools must be at full durability, and also applies to armors.
§6You might need to add a modifier to the new tool to refresh its modifier slot count.
§cNote: The tool on the right will vanish after crafting.
